questions.answer1: These tests are based on well-established psychological models or generated by artificial intelligence, and validated through structured coherence and clarity standards.
questions.answer2: These tests are for self-exploration and entertainment only, and cannot replace clinical evaluation. Please consult a professional for diagnosis or treatment.
questions.question3: How many times can I repeat the same test?
questions.answer3: You can repeat the test as many times as you need. The results may vary depending on your emotional state.
questions.answer4: Yes! You can generate images with visual results and share them on social media or with friends.
questions.question5: Are there tests specifically designed to understand my relationship style?
questions.answer5: Yes. We offer attachment style tests, which are perfect for understanding your emotional patterns.
questions.answer6: We collect data such as test answers, language, device type, and browsing behavior (anonymous).
questions.question7: Do you store sensitive personal data?
questions.answer7: We only store data when it is necessary for personalized customization, and always store it in an anonymous and secure manner, in accordance with LGPD regulations.
questions.question8: How do I delete my data?
questions.answer8: You can send an email to support@mindsecho.com to request complete deletion of your data.
questions.question9: Will my data be sold to third parties?
questions.answer9: No. Your data will not be sold or used for commercial purposes.
questions.question10: How do I log in to the application?
questions.answer10: You can use your email, Google ID, or other social login methods.
questions.question11: I forgot my password. What should I do?
questions.answer11: Please use the 'Forgot Password' option on the login screen, or reset your password via email or phone.
questions.question12: Can I use my account on multiple devices?
questions.answer12: Yes, as long as you use the same login method.
questions.question13: Someone accessed my account. What should I do?
questions.answer13: Please change your password immediately and contact customer service.
questions.answer14: After subscribing, you will unlock advanced content. The subscription plan can be monthly, quarterly, annual, or one-time payment.
questions.question15: Where can I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer15: Visit your app store (App Store or Google Play) and find the cancellation option or contact your credit card provider.
questions.question16: Can I still access after canceling my subscription?
questions.answer16: Yes. You will continue to have access until the end of the paid period.
questions.answer17: According to the current policy of the app store, refunds must be applied directly through the app store.
questions.answer18: Yes, this application provides free trials and optional paid content.
questions.question19: Does this application provide other language versions?
questions.answer19: We currently support Portuguese, English, and Simplified Chinese.
questions.answer20: Yes! Please send your suggestions to support@mindsecho.com
questions.question21: How do I contact customer service?
questions.answer21: Please send an email to support@mindsecho.com. Our team will reply within 2 business days.

logout.title: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout.description: You will not be able to submit test proposals after logging out.

terms.title: Terms
terms.content1: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services.
terms.content2: We collect only necessary information to provide and improve our services. This may include basic profile information, usage data, and any additional information you choose to provide.

changes.title: Changes to the Service and/or Terms
changes.content1: We reserve the right to modify or update our Privacy Policy at any time. Any significant changes will be notified to users through appropriate channels.
changes.content2: By continuing to use our services after such modifications, you agree to be bound by the updated Privacy Policy.

userProtocol.title: Terms of Use
userProtocol.content: Welcome to MindsEcho! This Terms of Use (hereinafter referred to as “this agreement”) applies to anyone accessing and using MindsEcho's digital platform in the Federative Republic of Brazil. Using our services means you fully agree to this agreement.

content1.title: Platform Description
content1.content: MindsEcho is a psychological test and self-exploration application that provides interactive content based on artificial language models and popular psychological theories.

content2.title: Acceptance of Terms
content2.content: By using this application, accessing any content, or registering an account, you have read, understood, and accepted this agreement.

content3.title: Registration and Access
content3.content: MindsEcho is only for personal, entertainment, or educational purposes. The following actions are prohibited:
content3.content1: - Unauthorized modification, distribution, or copying of content for commercial purposes.
content3.content2: - Using the platform to collect data from other users.
content3.content3: - Using robots or scripts to access or manipulate the system.

content4.title: Artificial Intelligence Generated Content
content4.content: Some tests and results are generated by artificial intelligence (e.g., GPT models). This content is for entertainment and self-exploration only and does not constitute clinical, legal, or professional advice.

content5.title: Intellectual Property
content5.content: All text, trademarks, logos, interfaces, and application content are protected by copyright and belong to MindsEcho or its licensors. No unauthorized copying is permitted.

content6.title: Subscription Plan
content6.content: - MindsEcho may provide paid features through regular subscriptions. - Rules are detailed in the corresponding subscription and renewal agreement.

content7.title: Privacy and Data Protection
content7.content: Using the platform means you have read and accepted our privacy policy. Data processing will follow the General Data Protection Law (LGPD). You can request the deletion or modification of your personal data.

content8.title: Account Termination
content8.content: If a user violates this agreement or engages in abusive behavior, MindsEcho may suspend or terminate their access.

content9.title: Liability Limitation
content9.content: MindsEcho does not guarantee specific results and is not responsible for decisions based on the provided content. We do not guarantee stability, continuous availability, or error-free operation.

content10.title: Changes to Terms
content10.content: This agreement may be modified at any time. Modifications will take effect immediately after being posted on the application or website. Continuing to use the platform will be deemed acceptance of the modified terms.

content11.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
content11.content: This agreement is governed by the laws of Brazil. The city of São Paulo is hereby designated as the court of first instance for any disputes arising from this agreement.

content12.content: If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact us via email:

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content: This privacy policy explains how MindsEcho collects, uses, stores, and protects the information of users who use our psychological test and self-exploration services through mobile applications, websites, and other digital interfaces.

content1.title: Collected Data
content1.content: We collect the following types of data:
content1.content1: - Identity data: email, username, anonymous device ID.
content1.content2: - Usage data: test history, replies, usage time, preferences, and click counts.
content1.content3: - Technical data: device type, operating system, language, approximate location.
content1.content4: Sensitive data: test replies that may reflect psychological or emotional characteristics (processed anonymously).

content2.title: Data Usage Purpose
content2.content2: - Enhance user experience and recommend related tests. - Comply with legal or contractual obligations.
content2.content3: - Ensure security, prevent fraud, and abuse.
content2.content4: - Provide technical support and process payments.

content3.title: Legal Basis for Processing
content3.content: Data processing is based on the following legal bases:
content3.content1: - User consent (through acceptance of this policy).
content3.content2: - Contract fulfillment (through use of application features).

content4.title: Data Sharing
content4.content: MindsEcho does not sell or share your personal data with third parties for commercial purposes.
content4.content1: We may share data with the following entities:
content4.content2: - Cloud infrastructure providers (Google Cloud, AWS, etc.).
content4.content3: - Payment platforms (Google Play, Apple Pay, etc.).
content4.content4: - Sharing data with legal authorities upon court order.

content5.title: Storage and Security
content5.content: Your data is stored on secure servers located in Brazil and/or abroad, following strict security and encryption protocols. We take technical and organizational measures to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of information.

content6.title: User Rights
content6.content: Under the General Data Protection Law (LGPD), you can:
content6.content1: - Request access, correction, or deletion of your data.
content6.content4: You can request via email: support@mindsecho.com

content7.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
content7.content: We use functional and analytical cookies to improve navigation and measure performance. You can configure your browser to disable cookies, but please note that this may affect your user experience.

content8.title: Data Retention
content8.content: We will retain data for the period necessary to achieve the purposes described in this policy or as required by law.

content9.title: Minor
content9.content: MindsEcho does not intentionally collect data from minors under 13 without the consent of their parents or guardians. If we detect abuse, data will be deleted immediately.

content10.title: Changes to this Policy
content10.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify users through the application or email. We recommend that you review this policy regularly.

content11.title: Contact Information
content11.content: If you have any questions or requests related to privacy and data protection, please contact us:

privacyPolicy.content12: By using MindsEcho, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and fully accepted this privacy policy.

loginProtocol.content: This login agreement (hereinafter referred to as “this agreement”) regulates the use of MindsEcho services, including access and use of the psychological test platform, and provides information on the obligations and responsibilities of users and the platform.

content1.title: Scope and Applicability
content1.content: This agreement applies to all users who access or use MindsEcho services, whether through mobile applications, websites, or other electronic means.

content2.title: Registration and Account Management
content2.content: Users must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. Using false or misleading information may result in account suspension.
content2.content2: The platform may impose restrictions to prevent duplicate email/phone registrations. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their passwords and login information.

content3.title: Usage Behavior
content3.content: Users are prohibited from using the platform for illegal or harmful activities, such as manipulating results, unauthorized access, or interfering with platform services.

content4.title: Artificial Intelligence Disclaimer
content4.content: Part of the content generated by the platform may be based on language models (e.g., GPT) for entertainment and self-exploration. Test results are not used for diagnosis or medical advice. The platform is not liable for misuse of the generated information.

content5.title: Psychological Content Usage Restrictions
content5.content: The content provided by the platform is for self-assessment and entertainment purposes only. The platform cannot replace medical, psychological, or therapeutic advice. If a user experiences severe psychological issues, it is recommended to seek professional help from a psychologist or psychiatrist.

content6.title: Privacy and Data Processing
content6.content: The platform collects user information, including test answers, preferences, and interaction data. The data will be processed according to the platform's privacy policy. Users agree to the platform collecting and processing their non-personal data, as follows. Users have the right to access, modify, or delete their personal data according to applicable law.

content7.title: Result Sharing Behavior
content7.content: Users can choose to share their results on social media or application communities. The platform reserves the right to display this information, but will not disclose user identities unless explicitly shared.

content8.title: Account Cancellation and Data Deletion
content8.content: The platform is not responsible for any damages caused by misuse of services. The platform is also not responsible for network failures, service interruptions, or third-party system failures.

content9.title: Agreement Changes
content9.content: MindsEcho reserves the right to change this agreement at any time. Any changes will be notified to users through in-app notifications or email. Continuing to use the platform after such changes will be deemed acceptance of the new terms.

content10.title: Applicable Law
content10.content: This agreement is governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. Any disputes arising from this agreement or the use of services shall be resolved by the courts of São Paulo.

subscribeProtocol.content: This subscription activation agreement (hereinafter referred to as “this agreement”) sets out the terms and conditions for users (“you”) to purchase and use MindsEcho platform paid services.

content1.title: Advanced Service Description
content1.content: After activating a subscription, you will have access to exclusive content, advanced psychological tests, personalized reports, chart results, shareable visual content, personalized recommendations, and other advanced features.

content2.title: Eligibility
content2.content: You must be at least 18 years old or have the consent of a legal guardian to activate a paid subscription.

content3.title: Payment and Settlement Methods
content3.content: Payments will be processed using the payment method you choose (credit card, debit card, Google Play, Apple Pay, or other payment methods provided by the platform). The settlement method can be one-time or recurring, depending on the package you choose (monthly, quarterly, or annual).

content4.title: Subscription Activation
content4.content: Some subscriptions may be set to auto-renew, unless you cancel in advance. Renewals will follow the same plan and price, unless you notify in advance.

content5.title: Unsubscription
content5.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time through the settings area of the platform or payment system (Google Play/App Store). Canceling a subscription will prevent future renewals, but will not result in a pro-rated refund for the time already used.

content6.title: Refund
content6.content: Refunds will be processed according to the policies of the local app store (Google Play/App Store) and Brazilian consumer law. MindsEcho does not guarantee direct refunds outside these platforms.

content7.title: Guarantee Limitations
content7.content: Subscriptions do not guarantee psychological diagnosis or clinical benefits. Content is for self-exploration and entertainment only. The platform is not responsible for decisions based on results.

content8.title: Agreement Changes
content8.content: MindsEcho may periodically revise this agreement. Changes will be communicated through the application or email, and continued use of the service will be deemed acceptance of the new terms.

content9.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
content9.content: This agreement is governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. The city of São Paulo is hereby designated as the court of first instance for any disputes arising from this agreement.

subscribeProtocol.content10: If you do not agree to the above terms, do not activate the subscription. Activating a subscription means you have read, understood, and fully accepted this agreement.

renewProtocol.title: Renewal Agreement
renewProtocol.content: This renewal agreement (hereinafter referred to as “this agreement”) sets out the terms and conditions for users (“you”) to purchase and use MindsEcho platform paid services.

content1.title: Renewal Service Description
content1.content: By renewing, users will be able to use MindsEcho's advanced features, such as advanced psychological tests, personalized analysis, visual reports, exclusive statistics, and priority support, without any restrictions.

content2.title: Automatic Renewal
content2.content: The subscription service will automatically renew at the end of each period (monthly, quarterly, or annual), using the same payment method previously authorized, unless the user cancels in advance.

content3.title: Payment Method
content3.content: Bills will be processed through the integrated platform (App Store, Google Play, credit/debit card). MindsEcho does not directly store financial data.

content4.title: Unsubscription
content4.content: Users can cancel automatic renewal at any time through the app store settings or in-app. Canceling a renewal will stop the next billing period, but the service will remain active until the current renewal period ends.

content5.title: Refund Policy
content5.content: According to the guidelines of Google Play and App Store, you can apply for a refund directly from the app store within the legal period. MindsEcho does not provide direct refunds outside these platforms.

content6.title: Subscription Terms Changes
content6.content: MindsEcho reserves the right to adjust prices, modify subscription benefits, and update these terms. Any changes will be communicated through email or in-app in advance.

content7.title: Cancellation for Non-Compliance
content7.content: If you violate the usage terms, engage in abusive behavior, commit fraud, or infringe on intellectual property rights, MindsEcho may suspend or cancel your subscription without prior notice and without obligation to provide refunds.

content8.title: Liability Limitation
content8.content: Continuous subscription does not guarantee clinical diagnosis or replace professional medical or psychological advice. This content is intended for educational and self-exploration purposes. MindsEcho is not responsible for decisions based on the results obtained.

content9.title: Data Protection and Privacy
content9.content: Data collected during the subscription period is subject to the platform's privacy policy and will be processed according to the General Data Protection Law (LGPD). Users have the right to access, correct, and delete their data.

content10.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
content10.content: This agreement is governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. Any disputes arising from this agreement or the use of services shall be resolved by the courts of São Paulo.

renewProtocol.content11: By subscribing to MindsEcho's continuous subscription service, you agree to have read, understood, and fully accepted the terms set forth herein.

chat.hello: Hello, I am your mental AI assistant. What would you like to explore? Feel free to ask me any questions!
chat.error: Sorry, I didn't understand. Could you rephrase that?

answerTips.tips1: Please slide to select the level that best describes you

result.title: Discover the Real You
result.subtitle: Gain deeper insights into your inner traits through scientific personality assessments

exit.title: Are you sure you want to exit the test?
exit.description: You can save the current test progress so that you can continue answering questions next time.

traits.teamBuilderDesc: You are a great team builder

scientific.question: Is the test scientifically based?
scientific.answer: Our assessment is based on psychological research and expert advice and has a certain reference value.

accuracy.question: Are the test results accurate?
accuracy.answer: The test results are for reference only. The real you is more complex and unique than any test.

duration.question: How long does it take to complete?
duration.answer: It takes about 8 minutes. It is recommended to complete it in a quiet environment to obtain more accurate results.

textProgress.title: Summary of Psychological Analysis
textProgress.subtitle: Analysis and guidance from professional psychologists

items.unique: Everyone is unique, and your combination of personality traits makes you who you are today.
items.understanding: Understanding your strengths and room for growth is an important starting point for personal development.
items.traits: Remember, personality traits are neither good nor bad, the key is how to play to your strengths.
items.reflection: Continuous self-reflection and learning will help you go further on the road of life.
items.potential: Believe in yourself, embrace change, your potential is far greater than you think

selfAwareness.title: Self-awareness
selfAwareness.description: Understanding yourself and your unique traits

skillDevelopment.title: Skill Development
skillDevelopment.description: Building and enhancing your core competencies

practicalApplication.title: Practical Application
practicalApplication.description: Applying your skills in real-world situations

influence.title: Influencing Others
influence.description: Making a positive impact on those around you

share.message: Check out this amazing personality test!
share.title: Personality Test

card.title: Pathways of Personality: MBTI Snapshot
card.description: A brief yet insightful assessment that reveals your core MBTI type by examining how you gain energy, process information, make decisions, and organize life.

avatar.title: Your own image?
avatar.description: Animal image that represents your personality

feature.title: What is your personality type?
feature.subtitle: Get your own personality tag and detailed analysis

inspirations.leadership: A true leader does not tell others what to do, but inspires them to want to do it. You possess this gift, being skilled at motivating and guiding others.
inspirations.empathy: Your empathy and emotional intelligence allow you to understand others deeply, making you a natural guide in both personal and professional relationships.
inspirations.potential: You have the rare ability to see potential in others and help them realize it. This makes you not just a leader, but a mentor who creates lasting positive impact.

radar.title: Multi-dimensional analysis
radar.subtitle: Comprehensively evaluate your performance and development potential in each dimension

badge.title: Your trait badges
badge.subtitle: Congratulations on earning the following achievement badges

youth.description: Support healthy growth of young people
